mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cbt_cr(fact, mind, why_correct, why_doubt, new_thought, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{fact}, #{mind}, #{whyCorrect}, #{whyDoubt}, #{newThought}, #{user_id}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE cbt_cr SET fact = #{fact}, mind = #{mind}, why_correct = #{whyCorrect}, why_doubt = #{whyDoubt}, new_thought = #{newThought}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT cc.id, cc.fact, cc.mind, cc.why_correct, cc.why_doubt, cc.new_thought, cc.user_id, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, nf.id as nf_id, nf.negative_feel_name, nf.created_at as nf_created_at, nf.updated_at as nf_updated_at, pf.id as pf_id, pf.positive_feel_name, pf.created_at as pf_created_at, pf.updated_at as pf_updated_at, dl.id as dl_id, dl.distortion_name, dl.info, dl.created_at as dl_created_at, dl.updated_at as dl_updated_at FROM cbt_cr cc LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_negative_feels ccnf ON cc.id = ccnf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN negative_feels nf ON ccnf.negative_feel_id = nf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_positive_feels ccpf ON cc.id = ccpf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN positive_feels pf ON ccpf.positive_feel_id = pf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_distortion_relations ccdr ON cc.id = ccdr.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN distortion_lists dl ON ccdr.distortion_list_id = dl.id WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cc.id, nf.id, pf.id, dl.id

SELECT cc.id, cc.fact, cc.mind, cc.why_correct, cc.why_doubt, cc.new_thought, cc.user_id, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, nf.id as nf_id, nf.negative_feel_name, nf.created_at as nf_created_at, nf.updated_at as nf_updated_at, pf.id as pf_id, pf.positive_feel_name, pf.created_at as pf_created_at, pf.updated_at as pf_updated_at, dl.id as dl_id, dl.distortion_name, dl.info, dl.created_at as dl_created_at, dl.updated_at as dl_updated_at FROM cbt_cr cc LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_negative_feels ccnf ON cc.id = ccnf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN negative_feels nf ON ccnf.negative_feel_id = nf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_positive_feels ccpf ON cc.id = ccpf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN positive_feels pf ON ccpf.positive_feel_id = pf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_distortion_relations ccdr ON cc.id = ccdr.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN distortion_lists dl ON ccdr.distortion_list_id = dl.id WHERE cc.id = #{cbtCrId} ORDER BY cc.id, nf.id, pf.id, dl.id

SELECT nf.negative_feel_name as negativeFeelName, COUNT(ccnf.negative_feel_id) as count FROM cbt_cr cc INNER JOIN cbt_cr_negative_feels ccnf ON cc.id = ccnf.cbt_cr_id INNER JOIN negative_feels nf ON ccnf.negative_feel_id = nf.id WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY nf.negative_feel_name ORDER BY COUNT(ccnf.negative_feel_id) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT cc.id, cc.fact, cc.mind, cc.why_correct, cc.why_doubt, cc.new_thought, cc.user_id, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, nf.id as nf_id, nf.negative_feel_name, nf.created_at as nf_created_at, nf.updated_at as nf_updated_at, pf.id as pf_id, pf.positive_feel_name, pf.created_at as pf_created_at, pf.updated_at as pf_updated_at, dl.id as dl_id, dl.distortion_name, dl.info, dl.created_at as dl_created_at, dl.updated_at as dl_updated_at, t.id as tag_id, t.tag_name, t.user_id as tag_user_id, t.created_at as tag_created_at, t.updated_at as tag_updated_at FROM cbt_cr cc LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_negative_feels ccnf ON cc.id = ccnf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN negative_feels nf ON ccnf.negative_feel_id = nf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_positive_feels ccpf ON cc.id = ccpf.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN positive_feels pf ON ccpf.positive_feel_id = pf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_distortion_relations ccdr ON cc.id = ccdr.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN distortion_lists dl ON ccdr.distortion_list_id = dl.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cbt_cr_tag_relations cctr ON cc.id = cctr.cbt_cr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tags t ON cctr.tag_id = t.id WHERE cc.id = #{cbtCrId} ORDER BY cc.id, nf.id, pf.id, dl.id, t.id
